js.autostartDisabled: Die Applikation startet nicht mehr automatisch beim Systemstart

js.artistNameDisabled: Der Künstlername wird nicht mehr im Songtitel gespeichert

js.clearListDisabled: Die URL Liste wird nicht mehr nach einem Download geleert

js.noValidURL: You didn't enter a valid URL
js.urlInList: This URL is already in the list
js.urlAdded: URL has been added to the list
js.urlsAdded: URLs have been added to the list
js.downloadMode: You didn't choose a download mode in the settings
js.codec: You didn't choose a codec in the settings
js.quality: You didn't choose a quality in the settings
js.storageLocation: You didn't choose a storage location
js.permission: Please close the browser, as otherwise access to the cookies cannot be obtained
js.songsDownloaded: All songs have been successfully downloaded
js.downloadAborted: The download has been successfully aborted
js.newVersion: Version XXX is available and is being downloaded..
js.updateDownloaded: Update downloaded. Restart the application now to apply the changes.
js.settingsSaved: The settings are saved from now on
js.settingsAborted: The settings are no longer saved
js.closeToTrayEnabled: The application now closes to tray
js.autostartEnabled: The application now starts with the system
js.autostartDisabled: The application no longer starts with the system
js.playlistContext: There are no options for playlists
js.artistNameEnabled: The arist name will now be saved in the song title
js.artistNameDisabled: The artist name will not be saved in the song title
js.clearListEnabled: The URL list will now be cleared after a download
js.clearListDisabled: The URL list will not be cleared after a download
js.noBrowser: You've enabled premium download but didn't select a browser
js.libUpdate: Libraries are being checked for updates
